話說小弟係初學program
呢排學習緊用python beautifulsoup 去攞一d股票data
我用緊python3.7
例如呢個網http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=00001

import requests as req
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
url="http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=00001"
r = req.get(url)
soup = BeautifulSoup(r.text,'html.parser')
a = soup.find_all(class_='grid_11')
print(a)

明明佢個網頁html code係<div id="cp_pLeft" class="grid_11" style="margin-left:0px; margin-top:0px"> <div class="content">
但唔知點解print唔到野出黎
係得呢段攞唔到data，係咪我用錯方法？
去yahoo down excel算啦
你肯定r.text入面有你要果段html？定你係browser見到有？
冇野做幫你睇埋 Cookie: AALTP=1

replies.msg:
唔該曬巴打
呢堆係我e+用緊ge code
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys
import uniout
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options

chrome_options = Options()
chrome_options.add_argument("--headless")

broswer = webdriver.Chrome(chrome_options=chrome_options)
broswer.get("http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=00001")
elem = broswer.find_element_by_id("sb2-txtSymbol-aa")
elem.send_keys("00001")
elem.send_keys(Keys.RETURN)
name = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("//*[@id='cp_ucStockBar_litInd_StockName']")
price = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("//*[@id='labelLast']/b/span")
ten = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("//td[@class='txt_r cls']")
print ("Company Name:", name.get_attribute('textContent'))
print ("Stock Price:", price.get_attribute('textContent'))
print ("10 SMA:", ten.get_attribute('textContent'))

但仲有少少問題想問
一個就係有2個位條xpath係一樣（1個月過往表現同10天SMA），點樣可以令佢分別攞到？
同埋output
('Company Name:', u'長和')
('Stock Price:', u'  83.750')
('10 SMA:', u'80.600 - 92.000')
唔知點解有個u係到
感謝萬分

replies.msg:
我e+轉左absolute xpath, run 一次都需要8秒左右
其實關唔關我用sublime text去run事？
呢段野要run成120秒 
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys
import uniout
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options

chrome_options = Options()
chrome_options.add_argument("--headless")
html = ""
for i in range(1,10):
	broswer = webdriver.Chrome(chrome_options=chrome_options)
	html = "http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=0000%s" % i 
	broswer.get(html)
	elem = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]")
	elem.click()
	name = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/label[1]/span[1]")
	price = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[1]/div[3]/div[1]/b[1]/span[1]")
	ten = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[2]")
	tenper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/span[1]")
	fifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[2]")
	fifper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[3]/span[1]")
	hundred = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[2]")
	hunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[3]/span[1]")
	twohundredfifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[2]")
	twohunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[3]/span[1]")
	turnover = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/div[3]")
	cost = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[9]/td[1]/div[1]/div[4]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[4]")

	print ("Company Name: %s" % name.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Stock Price: %s" % price.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("10 SMA:", ten.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8') , tenper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("50 SMA:", fifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), fifper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("100 SMA:", hundred.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), hunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("250 SMA:", twohundredfifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), twohunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Turnover: %s" % turnover.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Cost: %s" % cost.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))

broswer.quit()

	html = "http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=0000%s" % i

	elem = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]")
	elem.click()
	name = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/label[1]/span[1]")
	price = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[1]/div[3]/div[1]/b[1]/span[1]")
	ten = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[2]")
	tenper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/span[1]")
	fifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[2]")
	fifper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[3]/span[1]")
	hundred = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[2]")
	hunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[3]/span[1]")

	twohunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[3]/span[1]")
	turnover = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/div[3]")
	cost = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[9]/td[1]/div[1]/div[4]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[4]")

	print ("Company Name: %s" % name.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Stock Price: %s" % price.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("10 SMA:", ten.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8') , tenper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))

replies.msg:
岩岩轉左用呢段code，直接search number，有快到，但都要66秒
有咩方法可以加快佢
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys
import uniout
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options

chrome_options = Options()
chrome_options.add_argument("--headless")
broswer = webdriver.Chrome(chrome_options=chrome_options)
html = "http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=00001"
broswer.get(html)
for i in range(1,10):
	elem = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[1]/input[1]")
	elem.send_keys(i)
	elem.send_keys(Keys.RETURN)
	name = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/label[1]/span[1]")
	price = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[1]/div[3]/div[1]/b[1]/span[1]")
	ten = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[2]")
	tenper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/span[1]")
	fifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[2]")
	fifper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[3]/span[1]")
	hundred = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[2]")
	hunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[3]/span[1]")
	twohundredfifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[2]")
	twohunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[3]/span[1]")
	turnover = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/div[3]")
	cost = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[9]/td[1]/div[1]/div[4]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[4]")

	print ("Company Name: %s" % name.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Stock Price: %s" % price.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("10 SMA:", ten.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8') , tenper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("50 SMA:", fifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), fifper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("100 SMA:", hundred.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), hunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("250 SMA:", twohundredfifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), twohunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Turnover: %s" % turnover.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Cost: %s" % cost.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("-----------")

broswer.quit()

	hundred = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[2]")
	hunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[3]/span[1]")
	twohundredfifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[2]")
	twohunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[3]/span[1]")
	turnover = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/div[3]")
	cost = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[9]/td[1]/div[1]/div[4]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[4]")

	print ("Company Name: %s" % name.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Stock Price: %s" % price.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("10 SMA:", ten.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8') , tenper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("50 SMA:", fifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), fifper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("100 SMA:", hundred.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), hunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("250 SMA:", twohundredfifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), twohunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Turnover: %s" % turnover.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Cost: %s" % cost.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))

broswer.quit()

from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.common.keys import Keys
import uniout
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options

chrome_options = Options()
chrome_options.add_argument("--headless")
broswer = webdriver.Chrome(chrome_options=chrome_options)
html = "http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/quote/detail-quote.aspx?symbol=00001"
broswer.get(html)
for i in range(1,10):
	elem = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[1]/input[1]")
	elem.send_keys(i)
	elem.send_keys(Keys.RETURN)
	name = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/div[1]/label[1]/span[1]")
	price = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[1]/div[3]/div[1]/b[1]/span[1]")

	tenper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/span[1]")
	fifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[2]")
	fifper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[3]/span[1]")
	hundred = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[2]")
	hunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[3]/span[1]")
	twohundredfifty = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[2]")
	twohunper = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[4]/td[3]/span[1]")
	turnover = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[1]/td[3]/div[1]/div[3]")
	cost = broswer.find_element_by_xpath("html[1]/body[1]/form[1]/div[4]/div[3]/div[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[9]/td[1]/div[1]/div[4]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[3]/td[1]/table[1]/tbody[1]/tr[2]/td[4]")

	print ("Company Name: %s" % name.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("Stock Price: %s" % price.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("10 SMA:", ten.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8') , tenper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("50 SMA:", fifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), fifper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("100 SMA:", hundred.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), hunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
	print ("250 SMA:", twohundredfifty.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'), twohunper.get_attribute('textContent').encode('utf-8'))
